name: Chillie Paneer
steps: Heat oil in a frying pan and lightly fry the paneer and keep aside
In the remaining oil add garlic, green chillie, capsicum and onion and stirfry till light brown
Add approximately 150 ml of water and add tomato sauce, chillie sauce, soya sauce and vinegar and bring to boil
Add the paneer, cover pan with a lid and cook for 5 minutes in a low flame
Dissolve cornflour in 1/2 cup water and add to the mixture and cook for approximately for 2 to 3 minutes stirring continuously till a thick gravy is formed
Switch off the flame and add ajinamoto and stir
Your CHILLIE PANEER is ready to be served
